mapper.select: select record.* ,sysEntity.name as entityName ,optionEntity.path as optionEntityPath ,amtSdic.name as assignmentModeDname from sys_field as record left join sys_entity as sysEntity on sysEntity.id = record.entity_id LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary as amtSdic on amtSdic.code = record.assignment_mode_dcode left join sys_entity as optionEntity on optionEntity.id = record.option_entity_id where record.entity_id = #{entityId} and record.is_effect = 1 ORDER BY record.sort_order
